dct_title_s: The Hudson by daylight : map from New York Bay to the head of tide water : containing names of steams islands and heights of mountains according to the latest coast survey : also, the names of prominent residences, historic land marks, the old reaches of the Hudson and old Indian names
dct_description_sm: Cover title: The Hudson River map.; "Copyrighted 1894, by Wallace Bruce."
